info.title: Zoho Analytics API
info.description: API for managing data in Zoho Analytics workspaces and views.

tags.name: Embed APIs
tags.description: Embed APIs let you dynamically integrate Zoho Analytics reports and dashboards into your websites and applications.

get.description: Returns the URL to access the specified view.
Returns embed URL to access the specified view.
Returns private URL to access the specified view.

post.description: Create a private URL for the specified view.

delete.description: Remove private link access for the specified view.

post.description: Make the specified view publicly accessible.
Create a slideshow in the specified workspace.

put.description: Update details of the specified slideshow.

delete.description: Delete a specified slideshow in the workspace.

parameters.name: CONFIG
parameters.description: CONFIG JSON as stringified and URL-encoded

org-id.name: ZANALYTICS-ORGID
org-id.description: Organization ID (can be obtained using Get Organizations API).

criteria.description: If criteria is sent, then the rows matching the criteria alone are visible, else all the rows are visible.

includeTitle.description: To display the view name in the embedded mode.

includeDesc.description: To display the view description in the embedded mode.

includeToolBar.description: To include the toolbar in the embedded mode.

includeSearchBox.description: To include the search box in the table.

includeDatatypeSymbol.description: To include the datatype symbol in the table column.

legendPosition.description: Controls to display the position of the legend.

domainName.description: Provide the custom domain to obtain the view URL with the corresponding domain address.
Provide the custom domain to obtain the private URL with the corresponding domain address.

viewIds.description: View ids to be included in the slideshow.

accessType.description: Access type of the slideshow. 0: With Login, 1: Without login, 2: Sort

slideName.description: The new name of the slideshow.

viewIds.description: Updated view ids to be included in the slideshow.

regenerateSlideKey.description: Generate new slide key. If true, previous URL will be disabled.

accessType.description: Access type of the slideshow. 0: With Login, 1: Without login, 2: Sort
